titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3764) to establish a National Independent Inquiry Commission on Disaster Preparedness and Response to examine and evaluate the Federal Government's response to Hurricane Katrina and assess its ability to respond to future large-scale disasters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Slaughter. Petition No: 109-4.

bill.summary: 9/27/2005--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3764) to establish a National Independent Inquiry Commission on Disaster Preparedness and Response to examine and evaluate the Federal Government's response to Hurricane Katrina and assess its ability to respond to future large-scale disasters.
